I am a newbie with Cactus. I think I can run my tests fine. I do see a
TEST-<testcaseclass>.xml file generated. However the JUnitReport (ant)
task does not generate the correct report. The report states 0 tests run
whereas the TEST-<testcaseclass>.xml file correctly identfies two
cases (one expected failure and one success).
Please note that I have xalan.jar and xercesImpl.jar in my CLASSPATH.
I run ant 1.5.4 with cactus-13.1.6.1
I wonder if this is a configuration issue at my end.
Any pointers will be highly appreciated.
Shan.
